thread.title: Legalizing pot on back burner as Newsom focuses on gun control
thread.title_full: Legalizing pot on back burner as Newsom focuses on gun control - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Matier & Ross
title: Legalizing pot on back burner as Newsom focuses on gun control
text:
Photo: Carlos Avila Gonzalez, The Chronicle The lieutenant governor says the gun issue “is a very deep issue for many of us, particularly those of us with children.” The lieutenant governor says the gun issue “is a very deep...
There’s more to Lt. Gov. Gavin Newsom ’s backing of a proposed gun control initiative than just banning military-style magazines and requiring background checks for ammo sales. The lieutenant governor says the gun issue “is a very deep issue for many of us, particularly those of us with children.” The lieutenant governor says the gun issue “is a very deep...
